query.queryString: select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select num,name,subject from board order by num desc) data) where rnum>=25 and rnum<=7
select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select num,name,subject from board order by num desc) data) where rnum>=25 and rnum<=7

CREATE TABLE MEMBER (userId VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, userPwd VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, userName VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL, userBirth DATE, userTel VARCHAR2(20), CONSTRAINT PK_MEMBER_USERID PRIMARY KEY(userId))
CREATE table fileTest (num number(7) PRIMARY KEY, subject VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, saveFileName VARCHAR2(50), originalFileName VARCHAR2(50))
CREATE table imageTest (num number(7) PRIMARY KEY, subject VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, saveFileName VARCHAR2(50))

create table shopmember (id VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pwd VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, email1 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, email2 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, addr VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, hp1 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, hp2 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, hp3 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, birth_year VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, birth_month VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, birth_day VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_shopmember_id PRIMARY KEY(id))

create table shopmember (id VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pwd VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, email1 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, email2 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, addr VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, hp1 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, hp2 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, hp3 VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, birth_tf VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, birth_year VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, birth_month VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, birth_day VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, service_email VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, service_sms VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, service_dm VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, service_tm VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_shopmember_id PRIMARY KEY(id))
